items.name: Samsung 300K
items.description: Boot your Samsung device into Download-Mode incase it is stuck in a boot loop. (Old Version)
items.guide: Turn off device (unplug battery or fully drain battery), open the tool, connect to PC, then do instructions as told in Program.

items.name: Samsung 350K
items.description: Boot your Samsung device into Download-Mode incase it is stuck in a boot loop.
items.guide: Turn off device, plug in into PC, open program, Click button.

items.name: ##ceolifestyle Drum Kit (@hshsmarian)
items.description: Ripsquad and Bladee typa drum kit.. #ceolifestyle

items.name: IceDancer Official Drum Kit (by Ripsquadd)
items.description: Contains various sounds used in the Album Icedancer by Bladee, it no longer is available for purchase.

items.name: (GOATED) Utopia Sound Kit @fivethreesosa @slimejax
items.description: Yeat type Drum Kit. Great for beginners, would recommend. Also includes some samples.

items.name: YeatxKanKan DrumxLoopKit (@kyd.and.cambria)
items.description: Yeat and KanKan type Drum Kit, with a few samples. Great for beginners.
